overview: When Quinton, a 20 years old undergraduate student, wakes up after a party and doesn't recognize himself in the mirror, he has a mental breakdown. He sees another man's reflection in every window although his friends assert he still looks as usual. Frightened, the young man decides to visit Geonsen University's clinic where he meets Laureen Howard, a therapist whose strong personality tends to take over her job. Quinton engages in a real identity quest to find out why he suddenly sees himself and his life differently.
title: The Stranger in the Room
